# Pull Request

## Description
Please include a summary of the change and the related issue (if any). Reference issues with `Closes #<issue-number>` when applicable.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactor / cleanup
- [ ] Other (describe):

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests added or updated (unit/integration/e2e as appropriate)
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`npm run test:all`)
- [ ] Linter passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Type check passes (`npm run type-check`)
- [ ] Updated documentation (README / comments / CHANGELOG) if needed
- [ ] Code follows project style (Biome) and conventions
- [ ] Linked relevant issues / discussions

## Screenshots / Demo (if applicable)
Provide before/after screenshots or terminal output.

## Additional Notes
Anything else reviewers should know.
